com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.setup

类 AylaSetupCrypto

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.setup.AylaSetupCrypto

  • public class AylaSetupCrypto
extends java.lang.Object
    AylaSetupCrypto contains methods used to assist with public key crypto used during WiFi setup with a device. Since the normal key exchange using the cloud as a liaison between the mobile device and device module cannot be performed, as neither device can reach the Internet, a public key is used to protect the transfer of the LAN session key used for LAN communications.

    This class contains helper methods that use the SpongyCastle crypto library to assist with the crypto operations.

    另请参阅:
    http://rtyley.github.io/spongycastle/

      • generateKeyPair

        public void generateKeyPair()
        Creates the public / private key pair to be used for establishing a secure session during wifi setup on a device. This method must be called to create the keys before any of the other methods can be used.

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(byte[] src)
        Encrypts the specified bytes using our public key and returns the encrypted byte array.
        参数:
        src - Array of bytes to encrypt
        返回:
        what you passed in, but encrypted using our public key.

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(byte[] src)
        Decrypts the specified bytes using our public key and returns the decrypted byte array.
        参数:
        src - Array of bytes to decrypt
        返回:
        the decrypted data, or null if the data could not be decrypted
